channel.title: Chargers on Jake Waddle's Data Blog

item.title: The Chargers and Close Games
item.description: A Good Way to Lose As a Chargers fan for 20+ years, the last 5ish years have been interesting to say the least. In some ways it has been comical watching coach after coach lead Philip Rivers to an endless line of close defeats. Itâ€™s funny to blame the quarterback, but since 2015 Rivers is second only to Matt Ryan in passing yards. The failure modes transcend beyond quarterback play.
